name: Pushing back on unconstrained capitalism with Cory Doctorow (Changelog Interviews #565)
summary: This week we’re talking with Cory Doctorow (this episode contains explicit language) about how we can get back to that “new good internet.” Cory’s new book The Internet Con offers a lens to this conversation about disenshittifying the internet through anti-trust laws, limits on corporate tweaking, regulating unconstrai...
